title: Superb Apartment 2bd 2ba newly renovated place available
posting_body: 🥰🥰🥰 2 full bath rooms, kitchen has plenty of cabinets with dishwasher disposal, porch , laundry .

😊😊😊Fully renovated apartment in amazing shape with in Unit W/D, Central Air, Wine Fridge, 1 Car Parking and two large Bedrooms boast granite slab countertops, stainless steel appliances, beautiful hardwood flooring .
❤️❤️Contact me directly:

Property Location: 4260 S. Linden Road, Flint Twp. (Flint 48507 mailing)
.5 mile south of Bristol Road, Flint Twp. in last building of Valley Woods Professional Village Condo.

This building has a custom Exchanger system that continuously exchanges the interior recirculated air with the fresh outside air so that virus aerosol do not linger in the air, which helps protect against COVID-19.Suite Features: 5 dental operatories with lead lined wall units, perimeter lighting that shines both up and down; waiting room with open coat closet; private doctor office; lab area with 3 sinks, upper and lower cabinets; receptionist area; business area; 2-8 shelf high sliding file cabinets on tracks; dark room with sink; 11 large windows plus 1 round window; private common area to back door and; stairs to the 1,908 sq.
ft. basement.
Patient handicap ½ bath in shared front common area, key given out at receptionist area.
Carpet and tile throughout first floor suite.
Now offering short or long term sublet on some or all of the following: Rate TBD depending on needsOFFICE SPACE- about 6,000 sq.
ft. of 2nd floor space with private entrance (mix of offices, open office space, and breakroom)- about 2,000 sq.

ft. of 1st floor Office Space with private entrance (up to 12 private offices and a small open space)OUTDOOR STORAGE-2-3 acre of paved outdoor storage protected by fencing with barbed wire top and an automatic security gateSERVICE SHOP-10,000 sq. ft. service shop with drive thru doors and a mezzanine for storagePalace Place - 100% leasedBrick/stucco/aluminum 1 story 4,545 sf retail center with 4 suites.

Each have: its own HVAC unit; glass front windows on either side of glass front doors, 1/2 bath, grade door from back asphalt drive.4 individual roof mounted heat and air conditioning units (HVAC).1 light and awning over each of the 4 front doors.
Concrete sidewalk in front of the 4 suites.2 decorated trash containers on front sidewalk.
Lighted front asphalt parking lot with 25 regular and 2 handicap parking spots.
Gutter and downspouts on back of building with a light over the 4 back doors.1 overhanging light on south side of building.2013 electronic changeable 2 sided brick sign available.
Built: 1989, renovated 2002.
Front lawn, shrubs and decorative trees.
